entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 7.
